# dependencytrack_oidc_available (Data Source)

Fetch whether OIDC is available.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "dependencytrack_oidc_available" "example" {}

output "oidc_available" {
  value = data.dependencytrack_oidc_available.available
}
```

## Schema

### Read-Only

- `available` (Boolean) Whether OIDC is available.
